Tool

NameCreate New Shapes Layer
ID0
AuthorO. Conrad (c) 2008

Description

Creates a new empty shapes layer of given type, which might be either point, multipoint, line or polygon. Possible field types for the attributes table are: - string - date - color - unsigned 1 byte integer - signed 1 byte integer - unsigned 2 byte integer - signed 2 byte integer - unsigned 4 byte integer - signed 4 byte integer - unsigned 8 byte integer - signed 8 byte integer - 4 byte floating point number - 8 byte floating point number - binary

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Output
Shapes (*)Data Object (optional output)SHAPES
Options
NameTextNAMEDefault: New Shapes Layer
Shape TypeChoiceTYPEAvailable Choices: [0] Point [1] Multipoint [2] Lines [3] Polygon Default: 0
Vertex TypeChoiceVERTEXAvailable Choices: [0] x, y [1] x, y, z [2] x, y, z, m Default: 0
Number of AttributesIntegerNFIELDSMinimum: 1 Default: 2
AttributesParametersFIELDS6 Parameters: - 1. - 2. Default: Name - 3. Available Choices: [0] string [1] date [2] color [3] unsigned 1 byte integer [4] signed 1 byte integer [5] unsigned 2 byte integer [6] signed 2 byte integer [7] unsigned 4 byte integer [8] signed 4 byte integer [9] unsigned 8 byte integer [10] signed 8 byte integer [11] 4 byte floating point number [12] 8 byte floating point number [13] binary Default: 0 - 4. - 5. Default: Name - 6. Available Choices: [0] string [1] date [2] color [3] unsigned 1 byte integer [4] signed 1 byte integer [5] unsigned 2 byte integer [6] signed 2 byte integer [7] unsigned 4 byte integer [8] signed 4 byte integer [9] unsigned 8 byte integer [10] signed 8 byte integer [11] 4 byte floating point number [12] 8 byte floating point number [13] binary Default: 0
(*) optional
